attributes.action: Against Boris Johnson becoming Prime Minister
attributes.background: We just want to see peace and equalities in our country. If Boris become Prime Minister, it will cause division, we will no longer be a United Kingdom.. And we would like Nicolas Sturgeon to back us up to support our petition, and hope that Scotland do not go independent. Thank you.

rejection.details: In any case, as you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
